Posts.Content: DivaSop wrote: Hi, there: I just found a wonderful 5-minute video on core stereotactic biopsy and wanted to share the link: http://www.windsongradiology.com/womens_imaging/steriotactic.php# (Scroll down to the flash video link on the left.)  The video follows a woman through the entire procedure, which is clearly explained, and is greatly reassuring.  I registered just so that I could share this link. Since I may need this procedure myself one day soon, I thought the presentation was excellent and could be of great help to many on this site. My warmest wishes to all.  Take care. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Stereotactic Biopsy Video DivaSop pennysue64
